title: Parameter
description: A single parameters and its value

value.description: Value of the parameter, following python-like syntax
value.$comment: The pattern might not work in all cases - hopefully supports all numbers and basic oneliner expressions

is_string.description: Set to true to intepret this value as a string, without any evaluation
is_string.$comment: The objective is to avoid having quotes inside string values

source.description: Where the parameter comes from: the block class, or added as extra by the user

order.description: Order of the parameter in the block, optional
